about_the_game:
This is the skin DLC for《回家 - Homeward》
Let characters to change into new outfits, With the Majestic golden crown and red cloak！

Little King skin bundles
1.Leopard Cat：Little King skin
2.Formosan Black Bear：Little King skin
3.Formosan Rock-monkey：Little King skin
4.Formosan Clouded Leopard：Little King skin

After purchasing, please go to the in-game store page to choose "Put on"
detailed_description:

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.12
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
